biz.gabrys.lesscss.extended.compiler

Class SimpleExtendedCompiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • biz.gabrys.lesscss.extended.compiler.SimpleExtendedCompiler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExtendedCompiler

    public class SimpleExtendedCompiler
extends Object
implements ExtendedCompiler
    Compiler which wraps the native Less compiler expanding it with preparing source files before & compiled code after the compilation process.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected LessCompiler compiler
      The native compiler.
      protected SourceFileProvider fileProvider
      The provider responsible for returning file representation of the LessSource.
      protected PostCompilationProcessor postProcessor
      The post compilation processor.
      protected PreCompilationProcessor preProcessor
      The pre compilation processor.
